text: Hsu Kun-yuan (1 May 1957 - 6 June 2020) was a Taiwanese politician. He was born in Kaohsiung, Taiwan. He was a member of the Kuomintang. He was a member of the Kaohsiung City Council from 1994 until his death. From 2010 to 2014 and again from 2018 until his death, he was Speaker of the City Council. Hsu killed himself after jumping off his home in Kaohsiung on 6 June 2020, aged 63.Kaohsiung council speaker jumps to death after Han recall election ==References== Category:1957 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Suicides by jumping Category:Taiwanese politicians
title: Hsu Kun-yuan
